name: Sagi (yazan64)
description:
this game is made for Boss Rush jam 2023. and for Sagiki Ihori . the game is talking about. sagi  want to get the golden snack for the snackshop.

Controls

A or left arrow : move left 

D or right arrow : move right

Pause : escape

Space : jump

Space Ship Control

A : to move left

D : move right

Shoot : left mouse button or Right mouse button
